system.description: The character is trained to work in tandem with a comrade to enhance accuracy with precision weapons.
system.benefit: As long as the Character's Comrade is in Cohesion, and the character is using a weapon with the Accurate Quality, the Comrade may use their actions to take the Aim Action on behalf of the Character, who gains the benefits for themselves.

specialAbilities.name: Comrade Aim Assistance
specialAbilities.description: Your comrade can take the Aim action on your behalf when you use Accurate weapons and they are in Cohesion.
